arts.ttl: Watch: Milan go 2-0 up against Parma as Saelemaekers wins penalty and Leao converts
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan made it 2-0 inside the opening 25 minutes against Parma, as Rafael Leao followed Alexis Saelemaekers’ opener with a penalty. Midway through the first half, Milan were given the chance to double their lead, and Saelemaekers was again involved as he drew a penalty after scoring 10 minutes prior. arts.ttl: Watch: Saelemaekers gives Milan early lead vs. Parma with lovely 20-yard shot
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan got themselves ahead early on during their game against Parma, and it was Alexis Saelemaekers who got the goal. Milan took the lead in the 12th minute, and it was a quite simply gorgeous finish from Saelemaekers that broke the deadlock as his excellent start to the season continued.
